name: Lodestone
desc: Official notices and news, play guide, character profile.

desc: Countdown timers for weekly reset, daily reset, patches/maintenance and housing lotteries.

desc: Database of every item in the game. Crafting and gathering lists.

desc: Track squadron XP and calculate which recruits can successfully complete a mission.

name: FFXIV Fish Tracker
desc: See when hard-to-catch big fish are available.
